title: Frontend-side redeploy verification and UI manual-check support

requirements.summary: Ensure the existing redeploy and post-deploy verification flow remains reliable and includes clear guidance for manual UI verification after redeploy.
acceptanceCriteria: Run the existing automated redeploy flow (frontend/scripts/redeploy.sh) successfully without errors.
Run the existing post-deploy verification (frontend/scripts/redeploy-verify.sh) successfully; it confirms both canisters are running and the backend query test (listRooms) succeeds.
After redeploy, manually verify from the UI that entering a room and using the reload flow no longer produces backend errors in normal conditions.

file_operations.description: Harden the script's ergonomics for repeated redeploy runs (e.g., clearer failure context, consistent working-directory handling) while preserving the existing redeploy sequence and behavior required by REQ-2.

Enhance post-deploy verification output to more explicitly confirm the expected checks (both canisters running + listRooms query succeeds) and to clearly direct the tester to the UI reload flow verification step after the scripts pass.

Update the redeploy runbook to reflect the exact redeploy + verify flow, including an explicit manual UI checklist step for entering a room and using the message reload flow to confirm the backend fix is effective after redeploy.
